nm: X Marks the Spot o' Trouble

nml: Let It All Fade to Black üé≠üï≥

en: To move, press the "Move Left" and "Move Right" buttons. You can be seen if you make sounds - for example, walking or jumping. Go through the door on the right.
You can jump by pressing the jump button. To see through the space in front of you - point your mouse and press the sonar button.

To open some doors, you need to activate a button - it pulses and makes a quiet sound. After activating the button(s), you will have time to get to the door. If you do not have time, you need to activate the button again
Some rooms have "invisible" platforms. To reveal them, you must hit them with sonar. To do this, aim at the location where the sonar is used and press the sonar button.
